title: 轨道 Orbit
author: WardZhou
content:
You are the very dwarf planet
wandering around the star
The dim blue of you
The sparking red in you
Draw me in while push me away
Orbits cross for the last time
This is the most close and final one
Light fades away
Till the void fills in
For the ephemeral eternity
